Test.Name: ptz6: Correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response. Select ptz6 node on Management tab

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-4-1-1 SET AND GET PRESET
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Connect to media service Media service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Searching media profile with PTZ configuration for node [token = ptz6] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validating PTZ profile STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Moving pan/tilt to (-0,5, -0,5) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace zoom to (0) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Waiting 10 seconds for camera to move STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Setting preset [name=Test] for profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Getting presets for profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Searching for preset [token=preset_token1] STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Checking current pan/tilt and zoom position Current pan/tilt position (-1,-1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Warning: Actual pan/tilt position differs from expected (-0,5,-0,5) Current zoom position (0) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Moving pan/tilt to (0,5, 0,5) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace zoom to (1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Waiting 10 seconds for camera to move STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Setting preset [name=Test] for profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Getting presets for profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Searching for preset [token=preset_token1] STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Checking current pan/tilt and zoom position Current pan/tilt position (1,1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Warning: Actual pan/tilt position differs from expected (0,5,0,5) Current zoom position (1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Removing preset [token=preset_token1] from profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: CR68(fraction Ranges)
Test.Description: There are not integers ranges in GetConfigurationOptions

Test.Name: CR68(Relative Move - fraction Ranges)
Test.Description: Define Features with Features.277 in Features_2.xml(AbsoluteMove is not supported)

Test.Name: Relative Move - profile without PTZConfiguration
Test.Description: Define features with Features.277 in Features_2

Test.Name: Relative Move - correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response.

Test.Name: ptz6: No Absolute Move and no Relative Move
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response. No Absolute and Relative is supported Define features with Features.290 in Features_2.xml

Test.Name: Incorrect space in GetPresets
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response. Incorrect Space in GetProsets

Test.Name: Incorerect position in GetPresets
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response.

Test.Name: There is no created preset in GetPresets
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT doesn't return created preset in GetPresets.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-4-1-1 SET AND GET PRESET
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that Absolute or Relative movement is supported STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Connect to media service Media service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Searching media profile with PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validating PTZ profile STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Moving pan/tilt to (-0,5, -0,5) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace zoom to (0) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Waiting 10 seconds for camera to move STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Setting preset [name=Test] for profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Getting presets for profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Searching for preset [token=preset_token1] Index (zero based) must be greater than or equal to zero and less than the size of the argument list. STEP FAILED
STEP 15 - Removing preset [token=preset_token1] from profile [token=media_profile1] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Absolute Zoom is not supported
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response. Features.283 in Features_2.xml
